path: artifacts/NFJ Labs Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.nfjlabs-marketplace: contracts/NFJ Labs Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/nfjlabs-marketplace

findings.title: Improper Use of beforeTokenTransfer Hook with PausableUpgradable.sol WhenNotPaused Modifier
findings.description: The hook was not implemented properly, and the override feature did not work as expected.

findings.title: Platform owner can steal any ownerâ€™s NFTs: POC
findings.description: PlatformOwner can take ownership of tokens by calling cancelAuction() before they can be transferred to the new owner.

findings.title: Allow Setting Unchecked Arbitrary Values
findings.description: Malicious NFT creators can set royalties higher than 2.5%.

findings.title: NFT Item Put On Sale Cannot Be Removed Unless Purchased: POC1/POC2
findings.description: NFT items put on sale cannot be removed unless purchased, even after the auction period has elapsed.

findings.title: Input validation
findings.description: Zero addresses and arbitrary amounts can be passed in without reverting.

findings.title: Out of Gas Issue
findings.description: The for-loop in the transferToHigherBidder function may cause an out-of-gas issue if there are many bidders.

findings.title: Remove Unused Variable
findings.description: Unused variable MAX_BPS should be removed.

findings.title: Change Function Visibility from Public to External
findings.description: View functions with public visibility can be changed to external to save gas.

findings.title: Lack of Comments
findings.description: The codebase lacks comments, making it hard to understand.

findings.title: Emit events for notable changes to state
findings.description: Important changes are not logged by emitting events.

findings.title: Modifier only used once
findings.description: The NFTCreator() modifier is only called once and can be inlined.

findings.title: Inaccurate Code Behavior
findings.description: The contracts lack specified pragma solidity versions and do not properly interface with external contracts.
